reviewText: My son is enjoying being able to watch Caillou on his new portable dvd player. Now, he can watch it anywhere he goes. We just attached the player to his wheelchair tray and off we go!
Title: Caillou: The Best of Caillou: Caillou's Summer Vacation

reviewText: My main problem with this DVD is that they have the stuffed animals talking between shows. I dont understand the reasoning behind this and I feel like it was a waste of time. They could have used that extra time for more shows.
Title: Caillou: The Best of Caillou: Caillou's Summer Vacation

reviewText: My granddaughter watches Caillou on T.V. so I bought these for Xmas. The episodes keep her occupied over and over. She learns words as well as some good "life" lessons. However, as an adult I think Caillou is a bit whiny sometimes..lol
Title: Caillou: The Best of Caillou: Caillou's Summer Vacation

reviewText: Ignore anyone who says that Caillou is not a good cartoon for small children to watch and that he sets a poor example. I watched this a lot when I was little and loved it, and there are several advantages that Caillou has over most children's educational programming:1. The storylines do not repeat themselves (unlike with a certain explorer with a talking purple backpack and an anthropomorphic monkey that I know), therefore making the series more enjoyable for children and parents to watch.2. Caillou teaches children about common situations and how to handle them.3. The animation is bright and colorful, making it more likely to attract viewers.Not to mention that this video is a collection of episodes from some of the older seasons, and therefore they are far better than the stiffly-animated newer ones, which bored me when I was younger. Also, this involves the puppet segments centered around the experiences of Caillou's toys and pet cat, which I think inspire imagination and are a personal favorite of mine! A lot of people dislike these segments because they feel that they distract from the plot of the episode, but I for one adore them and wish that they had been kept in for the later seasons also. If you have a young nursery schooler or tot at home, buy this immediately! They will love it.
Title: Caillou: The Best of Caillou: Caillou's Summer Vacation

reviewText: If you already watch or have a DVR you probably already have all these episodes but for a trip or grandparents can be a great addition.Just don't expect new episodes.
Title: Caillou: The Best of Caillou: Caillou's Summer Vacation

reviewText: I bought this for my 2 year old grandson who loves Caillou!  He got 4 DVDs which he will watch over and over again.  I was pleased with the price and the quality of the DVDs.
Title: Caillou: The Best of Caillou: Caillou's Summer Vacation

reviewText: my lil grandson love caillou and he watches it on tv everyday when he is home, this helps me to get things done
summary: my grand son is a fan
Title: Caillou: The Best of Caillou: Caillou's Summer Vacation

reviewText: This DVD is awful! Creepy puppets that scare not only my son, but myself as well. It is only 28 minutes of run time. They play a 4 minute episode, then creepy puppets, then kids singing annoying songs, then another 4 minute episode and so on....  Please, save your money! The 7 dollar DVD is not worth trying to console an inconsolable toddler due to unexpected puppets.
Title: Caillou: The Best of Caillou: Caillou's Summer Vacation

reviewText: My 2 yr old absolutely Caillou! We are just a little more impressed with this video over the Caillou: Big Brother Caillou & other adventures. Again too many 'commercials' of the puppets 'Rexy, Gilbert & Teddy' and the kids actors doing skits about the adventures of summer vacation.
Title: Caillou: The Best of Caillou: Caillou's Summer Vacation
